reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The content of the cooperation consists of the following: 1) Capacity building in order to provide tools and means for current and future policy updates 2) Updating the energy policy to provide guidelines for future development in the energy sector 3) Supp orting the energy regulatory framework process by evaluating commenting and providing input on the work. The three objectives of the project are met by successfully completing the following four result areas: Result 1: Energy system model of Namibia develo ped. Result 2: Energy policy of Namibia updated. Result 3: Energy regulatory framework draft finished. Result 4: Competence of the Ministry of Mines and Energy (MME) personnel on energy system development increased.
